name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Backend Engineer, I bring 8 years of experience in developing high-performance solutions with a special focus on modern technologies such as **Elixir**, **Phoenix**, and **Postgres**. My extensive background in **CI/CD** and version control platforms like **GitLab**, **GitHub**, and **Jenkins** enables me to streamline deployment processes and enhance workflow efficiency. I am proficient in containerization and orchestration using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring reliable application performance and scalability.

I have significant experience building applications with **AWS** and a solid foundation in full-stack development with frameworks like **Next.js**, **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**. Additionally, I have a deep understanding of microservices architecture and event-driven systems, which allows me to design robust and secure applications while adhering to compliance standards. Throughout my career, I have successfully led projects that integrate predictive analytics and intelligent automation, demonstrating my ability to deliver innovative solutions in complex environments.
